name: Orycotal
description: Orycotal are humanoid creatures with rabbit-like ears and elongated limbs, giving them exceptional mobility. They are typically a peaceful ancestry who prefer the company of their own kind. However, Orycotal are always tempted to follow their curiosity to figure out the mysteries of the world.

options.name: Medium
options.description: Orycotal are medium sized creatures and suffer no penalty or benefits.

options.name: The Magic of Orycota
options.description: The orycotal are enchanted by ancient magic, allowing them to learn spells from the fey subschool if they are capable of learning metamagic spells. Additionally, your natural affinity with magic allows you to gain +1 skill with magic knowledge.

options.name: Action : Hop-Skip
options.description: You use a modified version of the jump action which allows you to jump from a standing position without the penalty for not having a running start. If you jump a distance equal to your movement speed, you also get credit as if you had used the Defend action.

options.name: Easily Startled
options.description: The orycotal are jumpy creatures, and startle easily. When you have the afraid condition, the required check for recovering from it is a 12 instead of a 10.
